# isPresentingFriendRequestViewController

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether your game presents the friends request view controller.

## Declaration

```swift
var isPresentingFriendRequestViewController: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the friends request view controller appears; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Adding Friends

- **presentFriendRequestCreator(from:)**: Presents a view controller with a Messages sheet for the player to request friends.
- **presentFriendRequestCreator(from:)**: Opens the Messages app with a sheet for the player to request friends.
